title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2236/97 of 10 November 1997 amending Regulations (EEC) No 417/85 and (EEC) No 418/85 on the application of Article 85 (3) of the Treaty to categories respectively of specialization agreements and of research and development agreements (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2236/97 of 10 November 1997 amending Regulations (EEC) No 417/85 and (EEC) No 418/85 on the application of Article 85 (3) of the Treaty to categories respectively of specialization agreements and of research and development agreements (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 10 of Regulation (EEC) No 417/85, '31 December 1997` is replaced by '31 December 2000`.
In Article 13 of Regulation (EEC) No 418/85, '31 December 1997` is replaced by '31 December 2000`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1997.
For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
